body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Current Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Dimmick's Point on North Manitou Island is closed  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Dimmick's Point on North Manitou Island is closed  To help protect nesting piping plovers, Dimmick's Point is closed to all traffic until further notice.
title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Current Conditions
